name: Vrata - An Interactive Meditation
description:
This is Vrata. It is an interactive meditation on either the kabbalistic tree of life or the tree of death. It takes place in a future where society is theocratically run by a supercomputer running an AI that is split into two seperate pseudo-consciousnesses, Jachin and Boaz. Both guard earths mysteries and will grant their knowledge on these mysteries to monks who take a vow of silence. This interactive meditation follows a monk who has taken this vow.

Made in a weekend using Bitsy for the Silent Bitsy Game Jam!

Also used the Borksy hacks "Gamepad Input" and "Dynamic Background Color"
